norm.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the usual or normal situation, way of doing something etc
norm.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Joyce’s style of writing was a striking departure from the literary norm.
Short term contracts are now the norm with some big companies.
norm.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the usual and expected situation, way of doing something etc
norm.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Private businesses award an average of 0.35% commission compared with the industry’s norm of 0.5%.
Budget surpluses are now the norm.
